uvi.description:
media: firewire: firedtv-avc: fix a buffer overflow in avc_ca_pmt()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.17 by commit 02a476ca886dc8155025fe99cbbad4121d029fa7. For more details please see the references link.
